preparazione: Add two saffron packet dissolved in little hot water.
Fry 150 g of a smashed sausage in a saucepan, when cooked, add it to the risotto
Cut 100 g of bologna into small pieces and add it to the risotto
Stir 200g of mixed cheese in the risotto (preferably gorgonzola, emmental and parmesan cheese
Stir in 150g of chopped natural tuna fish
